channel.title: Test Containers on Ankit Sarkar | .NET Enthusiast | Azure Cloud Practitioner
channel.description: Recent content in Test Containers on Ankit Sarkar | .NET Enthusiast | Azure Cloud Practitioner

item.title: Getting started with testing for Azure Blob Storage : Mocking Azure Blob/File Storage SDK Using FakeItEasy
item.description: Hi Everyone! As you are aware I have decided to move away from MOQ and insted we will use FakeItEasy for mocking the Azure Storage SDK. This post is adoptation of this which is using Moq. You can find the full series of how to perform unit and integration tests for Azure Blob Storage using Azurite Test Containers, and xUnit. Getting started with testing for Azure Blob Storage : Dependency Injection

item.title: Getting started with testing for Azure Blob Storage : Unit Test with help of FakeItEasy
item.description: Hi Everyone! In this post, we will discuss about the alternative framework for mocking. This post is adoptation of this which is using Moq. You can find the full series of how to perform unit and integration tests for Azure Blob Storage using Azurite Test Containers, and xUnit. Getting started with testing for Azure Blob Storage : Dependency Injection Getting started with testing for Azure Blob Storage : Unit Test with help of Moq

item.title: Getting started with testing for Azure Blob Storage : Mocking Azure Blob/File Storage SDK
item.description: Hi Everyone! This post is continuation of how to perform unit and integration tests for Azure Blob Storage using Azurite Test Containers, Moq and xUnit. Over the time, I will updated this page with links to individual posts : Getting started with testing for Azure Blob Storage : Dependency Injection Getting started with testing for Azure Blob Storage : Unit Test with help of Moq Getting started with testing for Azure Blob Storage : Unit Test with help of FakeItEasy (Alternative to MoQ)
